quizzes.question: What is the purpose of cin?
quizzes.textContent:
[h1]User Input[/h1]

To enable the user to input a value, use [b]cin [/b]in combination with the extraction operator ([b]>>[/b]). The variable containing the extracted data follows the operator.
The following example shows how to accept user input and store it in the [b]num [/b]variable: [code format="cpp"]int num;
[b]cin >> num;[/b][/code]
[note]As with [b]cout[/b], extractions on [b]cin [/b]can be chained to request more than one input in a single statement: cin >> a >> b;[/note]
